name: Offroad Land Cruiser Jeep Car Sim
name_original: Offroad Land Cruiser Jeep Car Sim
description:
Offroad Prado Jeep simulator game is full of fun and enjoyment and now available free to download and install on Google play store. You can enjoy suv offroad Prado jeep car simulator driving free in full 3D natural and realistic environment. Offroad Prado Jeep simulator has multiple features. 5 different jeeps, 4x4 Prado, car etc. with different colors and shapes are provided to drive and enjoy free. You can drive any Jeep among them according to your own choice.
There are 3 modes of playing are offered in this offroad Prado jeep simulator. They are free, check points and challenge mode you can select any mode in which you want to drive the Prado jeep. In free mode you are free to drive the jeep anywhere and enjoy it. In check point mode you have to catch the check points by passing through a little bit hard ways and crossing the water areas using the pull that is very dangerous if you don’t care about that you might be fall from the pull and your jeep will be crashed and level will be failed. The most tough and difficult mode is the challenge mode in which you have to drive the Prado jeep on very small tracks that is crazy and dangerous. There is water on both sides of the road and your little mistake will lead your jeep into the water and your level will be failed. So drive carefully by using full controls.
15 levels in each of both check point and challenge modes are offered to enjoy. You have to complete all the levels in each mode to become expert in driving the 4x4 Prado Jeep offroad simulator.
Features:
Offroad Prado Jeep simulator has multiple features to enjoy and that make it different and unique from other Prado jeep games:
 Offroad realistic driving is offered
 Driving Prado Jeep in multiple modes like free, check point and challenge mode, is offered
 Heart touching music with the speed of Prado makes it more interesting to play
 15 different levels in each of both check point and challenge modes are provide to play
 HD and unique graphics make look attractive
 To drive Prado Jeep on the road between ocean and mountains is really great to enjoy
 Totally free to download and install available on the Google play store
If you want to enjoy offroad Prado Jeep driving then why are you waiting just download and install it on you android cell phone
